$shebang

#This script was auto generated by "rnmd" a runtime to execute code contained inside markdown documents

# ---------- Installer
$installer_code

# ---------- Proxy to Runtime and target document

if [ ! -f "$markdown_doc_path" ]; then
    echo "The markdown file $markdown_doc_path linked to by this proxy does not exist."
    echo "Did you move the file -> if so please reinstall for the new path by: "
    echo "'rnmd MARKDOWN_PATH --install SCRIPTNAME'"
    exit -1
fi

$runner$runtime_path $markdown_doc_path
